name: Queue
headline: All-in-one platform for agencies to launch and grow
description: Queue is an all-in-one platform for agencies and productized services to launch and grow their business. We integrate with your website so your clients can purchase your services, access their client portal, submit tasks, review work, and everything else in between.

founders.name: Masud Hossain, Founder
founders.description: Self taught engineer who went into medicine only to realize being a doctor sucks and building a startup is so much more exciting.

generated_description:
**Queue: The All-in-One Solution for Agencies**

Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator Batch S20, Queue is making waves from its base in Miami, FL. With a compact team of five, the company’s mission is straightforward: empower agencies to launch and grow their businesses through a seamless all-in-one platform. 

At its core, Queue integrates directly with your website, allowing clients to easily purchase services, access a client portal, submit tasks, and review work—all without the hassle of juggling multiple tools. Whether you’re a freelancer or running a large agency, Queue aims to streamline your workflow, enhancing client interactions and driving revenue.

### Key Features of Queue

**1. Sell Services**: Queue lets you offer subscriptions, one-off services, or hybrid options, catering to diverse client needs.

**2. Client Portal**: A dedicated space for clients to manage their requests and plans, enhancing communication and collaboration.

**3. Project Management**: Tailored workflows that engage both your team and clients, ensuring everyone stays in sync.

**4. Design Feedback**: A click-to-comment feature allows clients to provide direct feedback on files or live websites.

**5. AI Website Builder**: A newly launched feature that enables users to craft stunning websites with templates designed for conversion.

**6. Time Tracking and Custom Task Forms**: These tools help you keep the project on track and gather necessary info from clients efficiently.

Queue is not just about features; it’s about creating a comprehensive environment where creative agencies can thrive. With more than 1,500 businesses already leveraging its capabilities, it’s widely trusted across various sectors. 

**The Future with Queue**

Queue’s intuitive services don’t just aim for functionality; they focus on user experience, ensuring a client portal that employees love to use. Add in high-grade security and an impressive uptime of 99.99%, and you see why Queue is rapidly becoming the preferred platform for agencies around the globe. 

For those looking to optimize their operations, Queue offers a free trial until your first client signs up. Curious about transforming your agency’s workflow? Check out [usequeue.com](https://usequeue.com) to get started.

### Conclusion

In a landscape where every second counts, Queue’s all-in-one platform stands out by addressing the unique challenges faced by agencies. It’s not just software; it’s an operating system designed for creative minds, helping you launch, manage, and scale your agency efficiently.
